column1: # Basis for a phantom axial section of human thigh.
# Data consists primarily of manually traced outlines of major tissues based
# on a public domain diagram. Tracings were made using Inkscape
# Each record consists of 5 fields: layer
#  layer --a number indicating the order and color in which to draw the tissue
#  tissue --a string naming the tissue type
#  path --a string of numbers define the tissue's outline
# A thin layer of skin bounding the thigh
